column2: RT @USFWS: Natural floodplains along rivers allow room for floodwaters to disperse and slow down rather than rise, rage and threaten commun‚Ä¶
column3:
Natural floodplains along rivers allow room for floodwaters to disperse and slow down rather than rise, rage and threaten communities. They also control erosion and filter our drinking water. This photo is of the Ontonagon River in Michigan easily handles a flood.
